title: The Heroic Week of Victor Price: Coach and Encourager
summary: Victor Price discovers his unique power to amplify others' abilities, facing challenges and ultimately saving his city from disaster.
summaryGerman: Victor Price entdeckt seine einzigartige Fähigkeit, die Fähigkeiten anderer zu verstärken, stellt sich Herausforderungen und rettet letztendlich seine Stadt vor einer Katastrophe.
summaryDutch: Victor Price ontdekt zijn unieke kracht om de vaardigheden van anderen te versterken, staat voor uitdagingen en redt uiteindelijk zijn stad van een ramp.
summaryFrench: Victor Price découvre son pouvoir unique d'amplifier les capacités des autres, fait face à des défis et sauve finalement sa ville d'une catastrophe.

story.text: Victor Price, in his regular coaching session, inadvertently boosts a trainee's strength to superhuman levels. Puzzled and intrigued, he starts suspecting he has special abilities.
Curious about his newfound powers, Victor experiments by encouraging a struggling plant to flourish. The plant grows exponentially overnight, confirming his powers of encouragement.
Victor decides to use his abilities discreetly, helping individuals overcome their troubles. His actions begin to heal his community quietly and impressively.
An emergency strikes when a local building catches fire. Victor uses his powers to inspire the firefighters, boosting their efficiency and bravery to manage the crisis better.
News of his deeds starts to spread. Victor remains humble and focused, coaching kids at a community center and secretly using his powers to enhance their learning and sports skills.
A villain who thrives on fear learns about Victor's ability and aims to corrupt it. Victor faces his toughest challenge yet but successfully thwarts the villain’s plans with his positive influence.
The community recognizes Victor as a hero, not just for his supernatural abilities but for his genuine desire to uplift others. They honor him in a small, heartfelt ceremony.

ending: As the week concluded, Victor Price truly understood that real power lies in the capacity to inspire and elevate those around us.
moral: True heroism is found not in supernatural strength, but in the ability to positively influence and empower others.
